articles.title: Watch: 'Calamity in the middle!' New Zealand captain Kane Williamson run out for duck after mid-pitch col - The Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: New Zealand captain Kane Williamson was run out for a duck in the most bizarre fashion after a mid-pitch collision. It led to a collapse in New Zealand's innings and they were eventually bowled out for 179, giving Australia a massive lead.
